sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq, title, name, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, to_char(udate,'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, hits FROM nboard
WHERE $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
WHERE to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE '%$s_text$%'
ORDER BY unq DESC ) a ) b
WHERE unq > $unq1$
unq < $unq2$ AND rownum < 2
rn >= #s_no# AND rn <= #e_no#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nboard
WHERE $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
WHERE to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') LIKE '%$s_text$%'
SELECT title, name, content, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, to_char(udate,'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, hits FROM nboard WHERE unq=#unq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE nboard SET title=#title#, name=#name#, content=#content#, udate=sysdate WHERE unq=#unq#
UPDATE nboard SET hits=hits+1 WHERE unq=#unq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM nboard WHERE unq in ($values$)
